description.value:
You gain proficiency with one of the following: shortbow, longbow, light crossbow, heavy crossbow, repeating crossbow.

Whenever you cast the @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.spells-cantrips.58I1UTE8ZV4CJ5W6]{Adherent Ember} cantrip, it creates 1d4 additional embers and you can choose to shape the embers into ammunition appropriate for any ranged weapon you are proficient with.

system.requirements: 3rd level overall and have at least one level each in a Martial and Spellcaster class
